e57::RigidBodyTransform

e57::RigidBodyTransform Class Reference

The e57::RigidBodyTransform is a structure that defines a rigid body transform in cartesian coordinates. More...

Public Attributes

e57::Quaternion rotation
 A unit quaternion representing the rotation, R, of the transform.
e57::Translation translation
 The translation point vector, t, of the transform.

Detailed Description

The e57::RigidBodyTransform is a structure that defines a rigid body transform in cartesian coordinates.
